description: This file defines API route handlers for user-related operations in an Express.js server, including fetching and updating user profiles.

methods.name: router.get('/me', requireAuth, async (req, res) => {...})
methods.description: Handles GET requests to /api/users/me to retrieve the current user's profile.

methods.name: router.put('/me', requireAuth, [...], async (req, res) => {...})
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to /api/users/me to update the current user's profile.

methods.name: router.get('/:id', async (req, res) => {...})
methods.description: Handles GET requests to /api/users/:id to retrieve public profile information of a user.
